verse: This is the Message, God’s Word:
God’s Message to the family of Israel:
Woe to you who turn justice to vinegar
Now again, my Master’s Message, God, God-of-the-Angel-Armies:

header: Time to Face Hard Reality, Not Fantasy

verse: “Didn’t you, dear family of Israel, worship me faithfully for forty years in the wilderness, bringing the sacrifices and offerings I commanded? How is it you’ve stooped to dragging gimcrack statues of your so-called rulers around, hauling the cheap images of all your star-gods here and there? Since you like them so much, you can take them with you when I drive you into exile beyond Damascus.” God’s Message, God-of-the-Angel-Armies.
